sense.gloss: being absorbed in, losing oneself in, losing control of oneself

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑無我夢中↑↓|むがむちゅう|↓で↑部屋↑↓へや↓を↑飛↑↓と↓び↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: I ran out of the room without knowing what I was doing.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はジャズのことになると↑無我夢中↑↓|むがむちゅう|↓になる。
sdata.e: He is so crazy about jazz that he often forgets himself.
